field.name: summary
field.value: Release Notes sections are all empty

field.name: description
field.value:
The main trunk documentation has a section called "Release Notes" which contains:
"New Features", "Upgrading Notes", "Change Log".
None of these sections are filled out. Since they do pertain to a particular version, it should probably be decided what the next version# is going to be so these sections can start to be filled out (and would probably assume that the "last version" was RC3).

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: Release notes are shipped as part of the package

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Won't Fix''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''2.0''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
